label: Galaxies
description: Vast star systems like the Milky Way and Andromeda featured in stunning cosmic views.

label: Nebulae
description: Colorful clouds of gas and dust where stars are born and die.

label: Stars
description: From distant suns to supernova explosions and variable stars.

label: Planets
description: Discover Earth’s neighbors, from rocky Mercury to distant Neptune.

label: Moons
description: Explore the diverse moons orbiting planets across the solar system.

label: Asteroids & Comets
description: Small bodies like comets, asteroids, and meteoroids that fill our solar system.

label: Telescopes & Missions
description: Space-based and Earth-based instruments that capture the universe in detail.

label: Astronomy Concepts
description: Fundamental physics and cosmic phenomena that shape the universe.

label: NASA Missions
description: Historic and modern missions like Apollo, Artemis, and Perseverance.

label: Rockets & Spacecraft
description: The vehicles that carry us and our instruments into orbit and beyond.

label: International Space Station
description: Humanity’s orbital home for science, observation, and international cooperation.

label: Auroras & Airglow
description: Beautiful atmospheric light displays near Earth’s poles.

label: Eclipses & Transits
description: When the Sun, Moon, or planets align to create visual wonders.

label: Constellations & Skyscapes
description: Recognizable star patterns and breathtaking nightscapes.
